hero_description: Join our community of learners and gain access to expert-led courses & mentorshipment.
cta_subtitle: Join thousands of students who have achieved their goals with us.
service_subtitle: Get various benefits by joining our program.
why_choose_us_subtitle: We are committed to provide the best learning experience for students & support from professional mentors and up-to-date materials.
service_card_career_subtitle: Not sure how to upgrade your skill set? We guide you with a clear roadmap that fits your goals.
service_card_branding_subtitle: Stand out with a strong portfolio and positioning we help you craft from day one.
service_card_global_subtitle: Prepare to work internationally with training that follows global standards.
service_card_saving_subtitle: Learn premium skills without breaking the bank through our affordable plans.
program_subtitle: Choose a program that fits your needs and career goals.
course_bonus_checkout: Save up to 1% using bonus at checkout
notfound_course_caption: The course you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.
enroll_form_caption: Fill out your information so we can finalize your seat for this course.
enroll_notes_placeholder: Share learning goals, availability, or discount codes
enroll_disclaimer: By submitting, you agree to receive course updates, payment instructions, and access links via email or WhatsApp.
enroll_success: Thanks! We have received your enrollment request.
enroll_success_caption: Our team will contact you shortly with payment instructions and further details.
enroll_error: An error occurred while submitting your enrollment. Please try again.
enroll_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
enroll_invalid_phone: Please enter a valid phone number.
toast_cookie_message: We use cookies to personalize our website.
